title: Startup Founders Podcast Episode 15 – Jas Banwait, CEO and co-founder of Seat 14A
content: This week, I speak with Jas Banwait (@JasBanwait), the co-founder of one of our Batch 6 accelerator companies. This was recorded the day before our first demo day in Mountain view. Please rate and subscribe to the show on iTunes – and don't forget to send questions or comments to me @markjsaldana. Listen now: iTunes Stitcher RSS Feed If you’re a founder at a kickass startup, don’t forget to apply for Batch 007. Thanks for listening, and tune this Monday for a full week of NYC founder interviews!
